Pramod Kumar wrote:
> Hi '
> 
> Can any one tell me what would be the best approach to implement the
> Junit testcases
> for an already developed J2EE  application. I fear that it would be a
> redevelopment as we
> have to write TestCase classes for all the existing classes( Units ).Is 
> redevelopment
> of the application with the test driven development approach would be
> the best solution or
> we can implement the JUnit test cases for already exsisting application
> ? Please reply.

You absolutely have to read _Working Effectively with Legacy Code_. 
Believe me. It's well worth the invstment.

Here's one guiding rule to get you started: write most of your tests on 
code you have to fix, when you have to fix it. Do not try to write tests 
for the whole application without shipping new features.
--
